title: Buttermilk chocolate cake with chocolate fudge icing
ingredients: ['225ml buttermilk', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '400g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '120ml vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225ml boiling water', '250g plain flour', 'Chocolate fudge icing', '200g caster sugar', '60g unsweetened cocoa powder', '4 tablespoons milk', '50g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
